languages.text: "Э-этот вопрос потребует детального рассмотрения... нужно поднять все кодексы, подзаконные акты, уставы, положения... примерно за четыреста лет". {n}Чиновник немного бледнеет.{/n} "Но рано или поздно мы найдем ответ!"

"Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"
languages.original_text: "Э-этот вопрос потребует детального рассмотрения... нужно поднять все кодексы, подзаконные акты, уставы, положения... примерно за четыреста лет". {n}Чиновник немного бледнеет.{/n} "Но рано или поздно мы найдем ответ!"

traits.locale_text: "Th-this matter would require further investigation... we would have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

"Th-this matter would require further investigation... we would have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

"Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

"Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

"Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

languages.text: “这——这个问题还需要进一步调查……恐怕我们不得不翻阅所有的法典、细则、法规、条例……过去四百多年间的所有记录，恐怕都得翻一遍了。”{n}文员的脸色有点发白。{/n}“但我们迟早会找到答案！”
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: “这——这个问题还需要进一步调查……恐怕我们不得不翻阅所有的法典、细则、法规、条例……过去四百多年间的所有记录，恐怕都得翻一遍了。”{n}文员的脸色有点发白。{/n}“但我们迟早会找到答案！”

languages.text: «S-será necesario investigar en detalle este asunto... Tendremos que repasar los códices, reglamentos, estatutos, regulaciones... de los últimos cuatrocientos años». {n}El funcionario palidece ligeramente.{/n} «¡Pero daremos con la respuesta, tarde o temprano!».
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: «S-será necesario investigar en detalle este asunto... Tendremos que repasar los códices, reglamentos, estatutos, regulaciones... de los últimos cuatrocientos años». {n}El funcionario palidece ligeramente.{/n} «¡Pero daremos con la respuesta, tarde o temprano!».

languages.text: 「こ、この件はさらに調査が必要です…過去400年分の法典、内規、法令、規則などなど…細かく調べなければなりません」{n}職員は少し青ざめた。{/n}「ですが、遅かれ早かれ答えは出るでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: 「こ、この件はさらに調査が必要です…過去400年分の法典、内規、法令、規則などなど…細かく調べなければなりません」{n}職員は少し青ざめた。{/n}「ですが、遅かれ早かれ答えは出るでしょう！」

languages.text: "D-das müsste genauer untersucht werden ... Wir müssen die Kodexe, Verordnungen, Statuten und Regularien durchgehen ... aus den letzten hundert Jahren oder so." {n}Der Angestellte erblasst ein wenig.{/n} "Aber wir werden die Antwort früher oder später finden!"
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: "D-das müsste genauer untersucht werden ... Wir müssen die Kodexe, Verordnungen, Statuten und Regularien durchgehen ... aus den letzten hundert Jahren oder so." {n}Der Angestellte erblasst ein wenig.{/n} "Aber wir werden die Antwort früher oder später finden!"

languages.text: « I-Il va falloir creuser la question... Nous allons devoir consulter les codex, règlements, lois et régulations... de ces quatre cents dernières années, {n}annonce le greffier en pâlissant.{/n} Mais nous finirons bien par trouver la réponse ! »
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: « I-Il va falloir creuser la question... Nous allons devoir consulter les codex, règlements, lois et régulations... de ces quatre cents dernières années, {n}annonce le greffier en pâlissant.{/n} Mais nous finirons bien par trouver la réponse ! »

languages.text: "Bu husus, daha kapsamlı bir araştırma gerektiriyor. Son dört yüz yılda yürürlüğe giren kanunnameleri, tüzükleri, yasaları, mevzuatları incelemeliyiz." {n}Kâtip'in benzi hafiften atıyor.{/n} "Fakat cevabı eninde sonunda buluruz!"
languages.original_text: "Th-this matter requires further investigation... We will have to go over the codices, bylaws, statutes, regulations... from the last four hundred years or so." {n}The clerk pales a little.{/n} "But we'll find the answer sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu konu üzerinde daha detaylı bir çalışma yapmamız gerek. Son dört yüz yılda yürürlüğe giren kanunnameleri, tüzükleri, yasaları, mevzuatları incelemeliyiz." {n}Kâtip'in beti benzi atıyor.{/n} "Fakat cevabı eninde sonunda bulacağız."
